topic.title: Zeronet TOR V3 patch download link
topic.body:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/19HKdTAeBh5nRiKn791czY7TwRB1QNrf1Q/?:users/1HvNGwHKqhj3ZMEM53tz6jbdqe4LRpanEu:zn:dc17f896-bf3f-4962-bdd4-0a470040c9c5

https://git.disroot.org/anonymoose/ZeroNet_OnionV3

Download links for the V3 patch. Please install this in your zeronet folder if you want to use TOR from tomorrow.

If you want an already patched pack you can also use the zeroseed pack:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/19HKdTAeBh5nRiKn791czY7TwRB1QNrf1Q/?:users/1HvNGwHKqhj3ZMEM53tz6jbdqe4LRpanEu:zn:57f731e4-8943-4f3f-9e2f-375236fb3be5

https://antonellogalati.com/zeroseed-pack/

topic.title: Install the V3 patch on windows, mac or any other SO
topic.body:
Download the patch from:

https://git.disroot.org/anonymoose/ZeroNet_OnionV3

or

http://127.0.0.1:43110/19HKdTAeBh5nRiKn791czY7TwRB1QNrf1Q/?:users/1HvNGwHKqhj3ZMEM53tz6jbdqe4LRpanEu:zn:dc17f896-bf3f-4962-bdd4-0a470040c9c5

- from this repo move `upgrade_file/CryptEd25519.py` and `upgrade_file/CryptRsa.py` to `ZeroPath/src/Crypt/` 
- replace in `ZeroPath/src/Tor/TorManager.py` the 2 words `RSA1024` with `ED25519-V3`
- add the line `from Crypt import CryptEd25519` to the top of :
	- `ZeroPath/src/Tor/TorManager.py`
	- `ZeroPath/plugins/AnnounceZero/AnnounceZeroPlugin.py`

1632925044_19TrKZA9ifR8bvPbL64AbNqttCDkW.body:
0.7.2 V3b version (ready for torbrowser, last version of syncronite):
https://mega.nz/file/iG5WDKqY#wSXb5WgjNEcF_eXlLKf7CMzA5_PpHS3YmtU2koeN7Wo

Galactichan downloads + zeronet mobile V3 compatible:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/19HKdTAeBh5nRiKn791czY7TwRB1QNrf1Q/?:users/1HvNGwHKqhj3ZMEM53tz6jbdqe4LRpanEu:zn:57f731e4-8943-4f3f-9e2f-375236fb3be5:50

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1115_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): can be interesting to know what modifications was made and how one can verify that v3 works or not

i simply added the patch, change  the zerohello to a mine version and added some zites

> [styromaniac@kxoid.bit](#comment_108_1PxcegJ1mKoMHeS73f9MvXeUWDq8BdnSv3): Your bundle is pre-configured for Syncronite? If so, that's pretty cool.

yes! :)

> [styromaniac@kxoid.bit](#comment_122_1PxcegJ1mKoMHeS73f9MvXeUWDq8BdnSv3): I am macosquestions. I can test it for you on two different Macs.

thanks! Can you download my pack and report me any error the app will give? :)
